name: ChefU
description: Built exclusively for VR, ChefU puts you in your dream kitchen where you never have to wash dishes or clean up after yourself. Hone your cooking and knife skills with over 60 items to cook and dozens of cooking tools. Leave the mess for someone else to clean up.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or Equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: VR ONLY
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-6700 equivalent or better Graphics: GTX 1080 or Equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: VR ONLY
